descriptionHtml:
These files will change 64 of Lydias dialogue lines to be more sultry with mature inflections.
She now calls you \'Master\' and has a new delightful look on life.

We are missing 3 audio files which I cannot for the life of me locate, chief among these \"Lead the way\" FUCK YOU CK

Otherwise enjoy :P

Install the data folder in your data folder, Uninstall by removing sound file from your data folder (as if you would want to) 

http://www.twitch.tv/maveric83eq/b/314273509

Quick demo not all she has
(There is a file with mention of midgets and goats EASTEREGG HINT AMG)  lol
And yes i know we are missing some files very few but if you can locate them and comment with their code we will be more than happy to change them


Other files uploaded

Female Shout overhaul    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14323
Retardedly overtuned dungeon   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14987

And seriously will someone school my ass on how to make these work with NMM. 


-WARNING-  These files do screw with some other female followers, so if you have nord, redguard or breton female followers it might change a few of their lines. (As if anyone d/l this mod would care)  Thanks for reminding me Galenz.

ALSO if you run into lines we missed post them in comments plz and I will see about fixing them
author: ME
